room_title: Escape room "The Office of John Monroe" by Clue Pursuit in Springfield (MO)
room_description:
John Monroe was a private investigator. WAS! He died recently. The police said it was a murder, so his office is still sealed. You only have one hour to look around the place and find the evidence and clues, and to roll up the case of who killed John Monroe and why.
There are two identical escape rooms available. Race your friends to see who are the best escape artists!
